name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Premium quality cotton t-shirt with comfortable fit. Made from 100% organic cotton for breathable comfort all day long. Perfect for casual wear or layering.

name: Denim Jacket
description: Stylish denim jacket perfect for casual wear. Classic design with modern fit, featuring button closure and chest pockets.

name: Designer Sunglasses
description: UV protection designer sunglasses with premium frames. Polarized lenses provide superior clarity and protection from harmful UV rays.

name: Running Shoes
description: Comfortable running shoes with advanced cushioning. Engineered mesh upper provides breathability while the responsive midsole delivers energy return.

name: Leather Handbag
description: Genuine leather handbag with elegant design. Spacious interior with multiple compartments, perfect for work or casual outings.

name: Casual Sneakers
description: Comfortable casual sneakers for everyday wear. Durable construction with cushioned insole for all-day comfort.

name: Wool Scarf
description: Warm wool scarf perfect for winter. Soft and comfortable material with classic design that complements any outfit.

name: Formal Dress Shirt
description: Professional dress shirt for formal occasions. Wrinkle-resistant fabric with tailored fit for a polished look.

name: Sports Watch
description: Waterproof sports watch with multiple functions. Features heart rate monitor, GPS tracking, and long-lasting battery.

name: Slim Fit Jeans
description: Slim fit jeans with stretch fabric for comfort and mobility. Classic five-pocket design with modern tapered leg.

name: High Heel Pumps
description: Elegant high heel pumps perfect for formal events. Comfortable cushioned insole with slip-resistant sole.

name: Canvas Backpack
description: Durable canvas backpack with multiple compartments. Perfect for school, work, or travel with padded laptop sleeve.

name: Silk Blouse
description: Luxurious silk blouse with elegant drape. Professional yet feminine design perfect for office or evening wear.

name: Baseball Cap
description: Classic baseball cap with adjustable strap. Made from premium cotton twill with embroidered logo.

name: Ankle Boots
description: Stylish ankle boots with block heel. Genuine leather upper with side zip closure for easy wear.

name: Travel Duffel Bag
description: Spacious travel duffel bag with shoulder strap. Water-resistant material with multiple pockets for organization.

name: Cardigan Sweater
description: Cozy cardigan sweater perfect for layering. Soft knit fabric with button closure and ribbed cuffs.

name: Statement Necklace
description: Bold statement necklace that adds glamour to any outfit. Gold-plated finish with intricate design details.

name: Loafers
description: Classic leather loafers for professional or casual wear. Comfortable slip-on design with premium leather construction.

name: Crossbody Bag
description: Compact crossbody bag perfect for hands-free carrying. Adjustable strap with secure zipper closure.

name: Polo Shirt
description: Classic polo shirt with comfortable pique cotton fabric. Three-button placket with ribbed collar and cuffs.

name: Designer Belt
description: Premium leather belt with designer buckle. Adjustable length with sophisticated styling for formal or casual wear.

name: Platform Sandals
description: Comfortable platform sandals with ankle strap. Cushioned footbed with non-slip sole for all-day wear.

name: Messenger Bag
description: Professional messenger bag with laptop compartment. Durable canvas construction with leather trim and adjustable strap.
